content.rendered:
Fahim has been in academic education for over 10 years working as a Lecturer in Business. His speciality is in Management, Marketing and related modules. He brings along extensive industrial experience spanning over 15 years with global brands in the travel industry with significant management exposure.

After completing a first degree in Business and Marketing, went on to gain an MBA from the Bradford University School of Management. He is a Fellow of the Higher Education Academy (FHEA) and a full member of the Association of Business Executives.

Research Interests and Publications

Fahim’s research interests are in organisational change and the influence of technology.
